directions: Arrange 2 prosciutto slices on each plate. Sprinkle pomegranate seeds over. Arrange persimmon next to prosciutto. Mound arugula atop prosciutto. Scatter pistachios over. Sprinkle with pepper; drizzle with oil and vinegar.
ingredients: 1 large Fuyu persimmon, peeled, pitted, cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices
*Available at some supermarkets and at specialty foods stores.
title: Prosciutto with Persimmon, Pomegranate, and Arugula
